title: Person of Interest || Because I Built It
author: Real Scorsese
comment:
Most iconic line in the show. "I built it."

Beautiful tribute to the geek 🐦 who was the backbone of this amazing show.
Funny thing is, Harold is probablly the most important person in the world during this. He invented social media, had an important company, and made the machine.

After finishing the show a month ago, I really wanted to pay my tribute but I didn't have the time. unfortunately I still don't. so I am really glad that someone is making those awesome tributes nowadays. keep' em coming and GOOD JOB ♥
Such a well made character in such a underrated show. Thank you.
and the Soundtrack of this great show was outstanding, too. i watched every Episode again, and again.
description:
New video with #PersonOfInterest and Michael Emerson ! Harold Finch.
#MichaelEmerson #POI #HaroldFinch
